title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify user login is successful using valid email and password credentials, including role assignment and no data leakage across tenants.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid email and password for a registered user
Click the login button
Check that the user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard
Verify the user has the correct role and permissions assigned
Ensure no data from other tenants is accessible

title: User Authentication Failure
description: Verify login fails with invalid credentials and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid email and/or password
Click the login button
Verify login is rejected and an error message is displayed

title: Password Recovery Workflow
description: Validate password recovery email is sent and user can reset password successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the password recovery page
Input valid registered email address
Submit the password recovery request
Verify password recovery email is sent
Follow the reset link and set a new valid password
Verify password reset is successful and user can login with new password

title: Multi-Tenant Data Isolation
description: Ensure strict data segregation between tenants so users cannot access data outside their assigned store.

steps.description: Login as a user assigned to Tenant A
Attempt to access inventory or orders of Tenant B either via direct URL or API
Verify access is denied and no data from Tenant B is exposed

title: Inventory Item CRUD Operations
description: Test creation, reading, updating, and deletion of inventory items with stock tracking and low stock alerts.

steps.description: Log in as inventory manager
Create a new inventory item with all required details
Verify new inventory item is listed with correct data
Update the inventory item's quantity and details
Verify updates are correctly saved and displayed
Reduce stock level below low stock threshold
Check for low stock alert notification
Delete the inventory item
Confirm the inventory item no longer appears in the list

title: Recipe Ingredient Association
description: Verify recipes can be created and associated with inventory ingredients properly.

steps.description: Navigate to recipe management
Create a new recipe and link it to multiple inventory ingredients
Verify the recipe displays all associated ingredients with correct quantities
Modify ingredient quantities in the recipe
Confirm updates are saved and reflected in the recipe details

title: Visual Menu Design Updates and Live Preview
description: Check that menu design changes including product variants and add-ons are saved correctly and live preview updates dynamically.

steps.description: Login as a manager with menu design permissions
Open the menu design editor
Add a new product with variants and add-ons
Check live preview updates immediately reflecting changes
Reorder menu categories using drag-and-drop
Verify the new order is reflected in previews and saved correctly
Save menu design changes
Reload the menu design and confirm persistence of changes

title: Order Creation and Real-Time Kanban Board Update
description: Test order creation via POS and QR code scanning, including dine-in and takeaway, with instantaneous updates on the Kanban board and inventory adjustments.

steps.description: Login as a cashier
Create a new dine-in order via POS, assigning table number
Verify the order appears immediately on the Kanban board with correct status
Create a takeaway order via QR code scan
Confirm takeaway order appears on Kanban board linked to scanned QR code
Verify inventory levels update correctly corresponding to ordered items
Check loyalty points are increased for client if linked

title: Public Client Ordering Flow
description: Verify public clients can view menu, add items to cart, checkout with payment, and track order status reliably.

steps.description: Access public client menu page
Browse menu, select products including variants and add-ons, add them to the cart
Verify cart contents match selected items
Proceed to checkout
Complete payment via integrated gateway (e.g. MercadoPago)
Validate successful order placement and obtain order confirmation
Track the order status via client order status page
Confirm order status updates in real-time correctly

title: Staff Invitation and Role Assignment
description: Check staff invitation workflow sends email invites and that users created have correct role permissions per store.

steps.description: Login as a store owner or admin
Invite new staff member entering email and assigning role and permissions
Verify invitation email is sent
New staff member accepts the invite and sets password
Check user profile is created with correct permissions and linked to the store
New staff member logs in and attempts to access authorized and unauthorized areas
Confirm access control enforces permissions properly

title: Audit Log Entries
description: Verify all critical user actions generate audit log entries accessible to authorized users.

steps.description: Perform key actions such as login, inventory changes, order creation, and role changes
Access the audit log page as an authorized user
Confirm audit log displays entries with correct timestamps, user info, and action details
Verify filtering and search functionality works on audit logs

title: AI Product Description Generation
description: Test AI assistant generates relevant product descriptions without blocking UI and handles API errors gracefully.

steps.description: Navigate to product description generation section
Request AI to generate description for a sample product
Verify generated description appears timely without delay or UI freeze
Simulate AI API failure or timeout
Confirm system displays user-friendly error message and fallback option

title: PWA Offline Mode and Data Sync
description: Verify application works offline with cached data and syncs changes correctly when connection restores.

steps.description: Navigate to the application while online and load data
Switch network to offline mode
Perform actions such as viewing inventory, placing orders, and editing client info
Verify the UI reflects offline mode status and no errors occur
Reconnect the network
Ensure all offline changes sync correctly with backend and data remains consistent

title: Finance Reporting Accuracy
description: Validate financial reports display accurate totals, reflect cash shifts, and integrate payment gateways correctly.

steps.description: Login to finance module
Perform cash shift operations and complete payments including MercadoPago transactions
Generate financial report for the period
Verify report totals match expected values based on orders and payments
Check payment gateway statuses and receipts are correctly recorded

title: Staff Role-Based Access Control
description: Verify access to features and pages is restricted or allowed correctly based on user role and custom permissions per store.

steps.description: Login as staff member with limited permissions
Attempt to access restricted modules such as finance or admin panel
Confirm access is denied with proper error or redirect
Attempt to access allowed modules such as order management or inventory
Verify full functionality is available for permitted areas

title: Order Status Updates Reflect in Client and Staff UI
description: Ensure order status changes are propagated correctly and displayed on both staff Kanban board and public client order tracking in real time.

steps.description: Create a new order via POS or public client interface
Verify order appears on staff Kanban board
Change order status through staff UI (e.g., processing, ready, completed)
Validate that status changes appear instantly on client order tracking page

title: QR Code Order Linking and Scanning
description: Test QR code generation for tables, scanning, and linking orders accordingly in the system.

steps.description: Generate QR code for a specific restaurant table
Verify QR code renders and contains correct table identifier
Scan QR code using POS scanner
Confirm order creation form is pre-filled or linked with the scanned table

title: Store Settings Update Persistence
description: Verify that updates to store business details, payment settings, and multi-location configurations persist correctly.

steps.description: Login as store owner
Modify business details (contact info, business name)
Adjust payment settings and add a new location
Save changes
Reload settings page and verify all changes persist accurately
